titleStmt.title: Hierotelesia gamikē Christ at the wedding: the pristine sanctity and solemnity of Christian marriages, as they were celebrated by the Church of England. / Humbly presented to those gentlemen whom it concerns to consult and resolve what is best. By John Gauden, D.D. at Bocking in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Gauden, John, 1605-1662.

titleStmt.title: Hierotelesia gamikē Christ at the wedding: the pristine sanctity and solemnity of Christian marriages, as they were celebrated by the Church of England. / Humbly presented to those gentlemen whom it concerns to consult and resolve what is best. publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Cotes, for Andrew Crook, and are to be sold at the Green Dragon in Pauls Church-yard,
